tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Please keep in mind that the earlier you inform the DEU, the more solutions will be available to solve this issue.

answers.text: The Digital Education Unit has the capacity to provide support.
I do not want to build my examination.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: In this case, you would need to contact the DEU as soon as you notice this issue so that the DEU re-establishes your account access.

answers.text: I have lost access to the CLMS.

overallFeedback.feedback: You got it! If the support is approved, there are 3 possible outcomes: 1- DEU provides support in examination building; 2-DEU provides an examination extension; 3-DEU provides an examination extension and support in examination building

UI.noInput: Please answer before viewing the solution
UI.a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
UI.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
UI.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

confirmCheck.body: Are you sure you wish to finish ?

confirmRetry.body: Are you sure you wish to retry ?

question: Under which conditions can I receive additional support in examination building from the DEU? (Select all that apply)
